alert.note: Alert for Central Elko County; Eastern Elko County; Western Elko County, northern Eureka and Lander Counties north of Interstate 80 (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 08 at 10:44AM PDT until September 08 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 438, 469, AND 470... The National Weather Service in Elko has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect until 9 PM PDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 438, 469, and 470. * WIND...West winds becoming northwest 20-30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * HUMIDITY...RH values of 10-20 percent * IMPACTS...any current fires or those that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Central Elko County; Eastern Elko County; Western Elko County, northern Eureka and Lander Counties north of Interstate 80
